thread.title: Grateful Dead's Phil Lesh says he has cancer - Click Orlando

author: Source: Click Orlando
title: Grateful Dead's Phil Lesh says he has cancer - Click Orlando
text:
Phil Lesh, who was bassist for the rock band Grateful Dead, canceled two concerts after revealing he has bladder cancer. In a letter to fans posted Friday on the Facebook page for Terrapin Crossroads, his restaurant and concert venue in San Rafael, California, Lesh said he was diagnosed with bladder cancer earlier this month.
 Click Orlando.
